tieredStaking.expectedValueDescription: Represents the average return from spinning the wheel over time, based on the probability and value of each possible prize.
tieredStaking.spinsTooltip:
Your monthly spins depend on how much you stake and how long you lock it.

üîí Longer locks = more weight
üí∞ More stake = more spins

We calculate a weighted average of your stakes. Locking tokens for longer boosts your chances without needing to add more tokens.

üîÑ Your spins reset every month, so you receive a fresh number of spins based on your current staking setup.

howItWorks.title: What is Lingo?
howItWorks.description: Lingo is a rewards platform where you earn points, spin to win real prizes, join raffles, and unlock VIP experiences
howItWorks.getYourFirstSpin: Get your first spin just by leaving your email ‚Äî no credit card or purchase required.
howItWorks.weNeverSpamOrSellYourData: We never spam or sell your data. Ever.
howItWorks.yourPassEarnsPoints: Your pass earns points for you automatically, 24/7.
howItWorks.startsAtJust: Starts at just $10, and you can sell it anytime.
howItWorks.useYourPoints: Use your points to spin the wheel and win real rewards.

firstSection.platformRuns: Lingo Platform runs on Power Miles. Stake LINGO to earn Power Miles‚Äîthe more you stake, the more you earn!
firstSection.stakingExplanation: Staking is like putting money into a savings account‚Äîexcept instead of earning interest, you get Power Miles to play & win prizes!

secondSection.collectAll: Collect all 5 Elements for guaranteed VIP prizes!
secondSection.combinedText:
Smash asteroids with Power Miles to collect rare elements and raffle tickets.
Collect all 5 Elements for guaranteed VIP prizes!

faq.title: FAQ
faq.whyStakingAnswer: Staking LINGO is your gateway to earning Power Miles, which you can use to smash asteroids and enter raffles for real prizes like iPhones, Rolexes, and more. The more you stake, the more Power Miles you earn, and the better your chances of winning!
faq.whatArePowerMilesAnswer: Power Miles are points you earn by staking LINGO tokens. You earn 1 Power Mile per day for every 20 LINGO staked. Use 100 Power Miles to smash an asteroid and unlock Elements + raffle tickets. Collect all 5 Elements for guaranteed VIP prizes!

discord.joinCommunity: Join the Lingo Discord community and earn up to
discord.holdAnyRoles: Hold any of these roles on Discord to start earning

freePowerMiles.instantlyToBoost: instantly to boost your raffle odds.
freePowerMiles.important: IMPORTANT: It may take up to 10 minutes for your bonus to be allocated.

wheelInfo.title: Spin & Win Every Month
wheelInfo.description: Get spins on the Wheel based on the USD value of your LINGO staked. The LINGO price is locked at the moment of staking to calculate your spin allocation. Spins are distributed at the beginning of each month, but your number of spins is adjusted immediately whenever you stake or unstake.
wheelInfo.note: Note: Unused spins expire when new spins are allocated, so make sure to use them before the month ends!

tieredWheelInfo.title: Spin details
tieredWheelInfo.description:
Your monthly spins depend on how much you stake and how long you lock it.

üîí Longer locks = more weight
üí∞ More stake = more spins

We calculate a weighted average of your stakes. Locking tokens for longer boosts your chances without needing to add more tokens.

üîÑ Your spins reset every month, so you receive a fresh number of spins based on your current staking setup.

whatIsAPY.title:
What is
Average APY?
whatIsAPY.description: Your Average APY (Annual Percentage Yield) is the combined rate you're earning across all active stakes, factoring in your staking terms and any Element 6 boosts you've unlocked.
whatIsAPY.flexibleStaking: Flexible staking earns 5% APY. Locked staking offers 10% APY for 3 months, 20% APY for 6 months, and 30% APY for 12 months.
whatIsAPY.element6Boost: If you own Element 6, you get an additional boost: owning 5 adds 5%, owning 10 adds 10%, and owning 15 adds 15% to your staking rewards.
whatIsAPY.reflection: Your Average APY reflects all of these factors and updates based on your current staking setup.

elements.shareInAirdrops: A share of 30% in 3 airdrops of your choice
elements.luxuryCarTicket: A ticket to a luxury car giveaway at year‚Äôs end

howPowerMilesWork.title:
How
Power Miles Work
howPowerMilesWork.description: Stake LINGO to earn Power Miles, used for smashing asteroids and entering raffles for real prizes.
howPowerMilesWork.rewardsDetails: 100 Power Miles = 1 smash, unlocking an Element + raffle ticket. Win a raffle or collect all 5 Elements for a guaranteed prize.
howPowerMilesWork.boostDetails: Stake longer for up to 180% more Power Miles!
howPowerMilesWork.conclusion: More staked = faster earnings = bigger chances to win!

boostYourAPY.title:
Boost Your
Average APY
boostYourAPY.intro: Want to increase your rewards? Here's how:
boostYourAPY.lockStakes: Lock your stakes for longer periods to earn higher base APY ‚Äî 10% for 3 months, 20% for 6 months, and 30% for 12 months.
boostYourAPY.element6Boost: Then, boost even further by unlocking additional Element 6. The more Element 6 you hold, the higher your bonus: 5 Element 6 = +5%, 10 = +10%, 15 = +15%.
boostYourAPY.conclusion: The longer you stake and the more Element 6 you own, the more your Average APY grows.

myLevel.title: My Level
myLevel.description: Levels are based on your Power Miles Balance relative to others

giftCards.whatToDo: What do you want to do?

howDoesItWork.title: How does it work?
howDoesItWork.description: Lingo Platform runs on Power Miles, which you earn by staking LINGO tokens. Use Power Miles to smash asteroids (100 Power Miles per smash) or join weekly raffles.
howDoesItWork.elementsDescription: Each smash unlocks a reward Element:
elementsList: There are 5 unique Elements, each with different rarity.
Collect all 5 to unlock Element 6, which guarantees exclusive prizes‚Äîthe more you have, the bigger the rewards.
Every Element also grants a raffle ticket, with rarer Elements offering bigger prizes.
howDoesItWork.refundInfo: If you don't win a raffle, 30% of your Power Miles are refunded, letting you smash again. No losses, just rewards!
howDoesItWork.ticketInfo: You can also buy raffle tickets with Power Miles‚Äîthe more tickets, the higher your chances to win. Each raffle has a set ticket price. üöÄ

whatRewards.title: What rewards can I win?
whatRewards.element6Description: Unlocking Element 6 guarantees you top-tier rewards:
element6List: Supercharged Staking ‚Äì Earn up to 30% APY on your stake.
Airdrop King Status ‚Äì Get a share of 30% in three airdrops of your choice.
Year-End Jackpot ‚Äì Secure a ticket for a luxury car giveaway.
whatRewards.additionalDescription: Additionally, Lingo offers a variety of other exciting rewards, including:
additionalList: Prize raffles featuring gift cards, iPhones, laptops, vacations, PS5s, cars, and more. Unlike traditional raffles, active participants regularly win small or big prizes with Lingo!
Partner token airdrops ‚Äì get free tokens from top projects.
NFT badges to showcase your achievement (coming!)

staking.title: How does staking work?
description: Staking works like a savings account‚Äîbut instead of earning interest, you generate Power Miles to play & win prizes.
Stake LINGO tokens to start earning Power Miles automatically.
After the staking period ends, you can either:
Staking happens on the Base blockchain for security & efficiency.

options.flexible: Flexible staking ‚Äì withdraw at any time.
options.fixed: Fixed staking (3, 6, or 12 months) ‚Äì earns Power Miles faster with a boosted rate.

afterPeriod: Extend your stake for another fixed period to keep earning faster.
Withdraw your tokens‚Äîyour Power Miles will keep accumulating, just without the boost.

powerMiles.title: How are Power Miles calculated?
description: The more LINGO you stake, the more Power Miles you earn.
Power Miles accumulate hourly based on your active staking positions.
Your Power Miles balance is directly tied to your wallet and updates in real time.
powerMiles.flexible: Flexible staking ‚Äì 1 Power Mile per day for every 20 LINGO staked.
powerMiles.fixed: Fixed staking (3, 6, or 12 months) ‚Äì provides a power boost, allowing you to accumulate Power Miles faster.

superchargedStaking.title: How does Supercharged Staking work?
superchargedStaking.description: Once you unlock Element 6, you will earn LINGO tokens continuously on all your stakes, and your earnings become claimable every 3 months.
claimingList: You can claim your rewards every 3 months, and they go directly to your wallet‚Äîimmediately accessible, not automatically staked.
You'll also have the option to Claim & Stake to keep growing your rewards.
Your earnings accrue daily, so your rewards increase over time.
superchargedStaking.boostingDescription: If you own multiple Element 6, you get extra staking rewards:
rules: If you unstake, you lose your booster‚Äîall your Element 6 will be lost except one.
Each Element 6 expires one year after you acquire it.

airdropKing.title: How does Airdrop King Status work?
airdropKing.description: We'll set aside 30% of the total allocation exclusively for Element 6 holders. If you own Element 6, you will be able to register for the airdrop directly within the product. The reserved amount will then be shared among all Element 6 users who apply.

raffleWinners.title: How are raffle winners selected?
raffleWinners.description: To ensure a fair, transparent, and tamper-proof raffle, we use a combination of Chainlink VRF for generating verifiable randomness and seedrandom for deterministic winner selection. This process guarantees that no one can manipulate the results, and anyone can verify the outcome.

whatRewardsCanIWin.rafflesDescription: Join raffles for real-world prizes like gift cards, iPhones, laptops, vacations, and even cars!
whatRewardsCanIWin.elementsDescription: Or collect all 5 Elements for a guaranteed VIP prizes:
whatRewardsCanIWin.apyReward: üí∞ Up to 30% APY on your stake

playAndEarnNonstop.title: Play & Earn Nonstop
playAndEarnNonstop.description: Smash asteroids, collect all 5 elements, and unlock Element 6 ‚Äî your gateway to continuous LINGO rewards on every stake.
playAndEarnNonstop.flexibleStaking: With flexible staking, you earn 5% APY. Want more? Stake for 3 months to earn 10%, 6 months for 20%, or 12 months for a massive 30% APY.
playAndEarnNonstop.rewardsClaimable: Rewards are claimable every 3 months, sent straight to your wallet ‚Äî no auto-staking. You can also choose "Claim & Stake" to keep compounding. Your earnings grow daily.
playAndEarnNonstop.element6Boost: The more Element 6 you own, the more you boost your rewards. Own 5 for a 5% boost, 10 for a 10% boost, and 15 for a 15% boost. Just note: if you unstake, your booster is removed and all Element 6 are burned except one. Each Element 6 lasts 12 months.

superchargedStaking.multipleElement6: If you own multiple Element 6, you get extra staking rewards:
superchargedStaking.unstakeLoseBooster: If you unstake, you lose your booster‚Äîall your Element 6 will be lost except one.
superchargedStaking.element6Expires: Each Element 6 expires one year after you acquire it.

airdropKingStatus.title: How does Airdrop King Status work?
airdropKingStatus.description: We'll set aside 30% of the total allocation exclusively for Element 6 holders. If you own Element 6, you will be able to register for the airdrop directly within the product. The reserved amount will then be shared among all Element 6 users who apply.

raffleWinners.title: How are raffle winners selected?
raffleWinners.description: To ensure a fair, transparent, and tamper-proof raffle, we use a combination of Chainlink VRF for generating verifiable randomness and seedrandom for deterministic winner selection. This process guarantees that no one can manipulate the results, and anyone can verify the outcome.
raffleWinners.fileHashingDesc: The participant list (including ticket counts) is hashed to create a unique, tamper-proof identifier. This ensures that any changes to the list are easily detectable.
raffleWinners.seedGeneration: Seed Generation with Chainlink VRF ‚Äì Verifiable Randomness
raffleWinners.seedGenerationDesc: The file hash and raffle ID are used as input to generate three large random numbers (a random seed) via Chainlink VRF (Verifiable Random Function). Chainlink VRF provides cryptographic proof of how the random values were generated, ensuring fairness and transparency. The proof is verified on-chain before being used, ensuring no manipulation by any party.
raffleWinners.onChainRecordingDesc: The generated random seed and its associated cryptographic proof are recorded on the blockchain. This ensures the process is transparent, verifiable, and immutable, as the seed cannot be altered after being stored.
raffleWinners.winnerSelection: Winner Selection with seedrandom ‚Äì Fair and Deterministic
raffleWinners.verifiedSeed: The verified random seed from Chainlink VRF is fed into the seedrandom library, which produces deterministic pseudo-random numbers based on the seed.
raffleWinners.pseudoRandomNumbers: These pseudo-random numbers are then used to fairly select winners from the participant list.
raffleWinners.verifiableReproducible: Since seedrandom generates numbers in a predictable yet fair way from the given seed, the process remains verifiable and reproducible by anyone using the same seed.
raffleWinners.blockchainTransaction: Once the raffle is complete, the blockchain transaction details can be checked in the finished raffle details accessible from the finished raffles list.
raffleWinners.fullTransparency: This ensures full transparency, allowing anyone to verify the winners by rerunning the selection process using the recorded seed and the seedrandom library.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.description: Lingo Platform runs on Power Miles, which you earn by staking LINGO tokens. Use Power Miles to smash asteroids (100 Power Miles per smash) or join weekly raffles.
howItWorks.eachSmashUnlocks: Each smash unlocks a reward Element:
howItWorks.uniqueElements: There are 5 unique Elements, each with different rarity.
howItWorks.collectAll5: Collect all 5 to unlock Element 6, which guarantees exclusive prizes‚Äîthe more you have, the bigger the rewards.
howItWorks.everyElementGrants: Every Element also grants a raffle ticket, with rarer Elements offering bigger prizes.
howItWorks.noLossesJustRewards: If you don't win a raffle, 30% of your Power Miles are refunded, letting you smash again. No losses, just rewards!
howItWorks.buyRaffleTickets: You can also buy raffle tickets with Power Miles‚Äîthe more tickets, the higher your chances to win. Each raffle has a set ticket price. üöÄ

whatRewards.title: What rewards can I win?
whatRewards.unlockingElement6: Unlocking Element 6 guarantees you top-tier rewards:
whatRewards.superchargedStaking: Supercharged Staking ‚Äì Earn up to 30% APY on your stake.
whatRewards.airdropKingStatus: Airdrop King Status ‚Äì Get a share of 30% in three airdrops of your choice.
whatRewards.yearEndJackpot: Year-End Jackpot ‚Äì Secure a ticket for a luxury car giveaway.
whatRewards.additionalRewards: Additionally, Lingo offers a variety of other exciting rewards, including:
whatRewards.prizeRaffles: Prize raffles featuring gift cards, iPhones, laptops, vacations, PS5s, cars, and more. Unlike traditional raffles, active participants regularly win small or big prizes with Lingo!
whatRewards.partnerAirdrops: Partner token airdrops ‚Äì get free tokens from top projects.
whatRewards.nftBadges: NFT badges to showcase your achievement (coming!)

staking.title: How does staking work?
staking.savingsAccount: Staking works like a savings account‚Äîbut instead of earning interest, you generate Power Miles to play & win prizes.
staking.stakeLingo: Stake LINGO tokens to start earning Power Miles automatically.
staking.flexibleStaking: Flexible staking ‚Äì withdraw at any time.
staking.fixedStaking: Fixed staking (3, 6, or 12 months) ‚Äì earns Power Miles faster with a boosted rate.
staking.afterStakingPeriod: After the staking period ends, you can either:
staking.extendStake: Extend your stake for another fixed period to keep earning faster.
staking.withdrawTokens: Withdraw your tokens‚Äîyour Power Miles will keep accumulating, just without the boost.
staking.baseBlockchain: Staking happens on the Base blockchain for security & efficiency.

powerMilesCalculation.title: How are Power Miles calculated?
powerMilesCalculation.moreLingoMoreMiles: The more LINGO you stake, the more Power Miles you earn.
powerMilesCalculation.accumulateHourly: Power Miles accumulate hourly based on your active staking positions.
powerMilesCalculation.balanceTiedToWallet: Your Power Miles balance is directly tied to your wallet and updates in real time.
powerMilesCalculation.flexibleStakingRate: Flexible staking ‚Äì 1 Power Mile per day for every 20 LINGO staked.
powerMilesCalculation.fixedStakingRate: Fixed staking (3, 6, or 12 months) ‚Äì provides a power boost, allowing you to accumulate Power Miles faster.
